name: People Who Shine In The Society
name_original: People Who Shine In The Society
description:
Our game is called people who shine in society, and it's a game created in the context of social occupations. Is a shooting pass running cool rougelike game. Game background: Human beings play different roles in the society, but want to survive in the society needs to engage in different occupations, occupations are not high and low, are an indispensable part of the society.

The player has two characters to choose from, a fireman and a soldier. The two game characters carry different weapons, weapon attack effect and attack damage is different. We made two characters so that players could be more selective in the game according to their preferences.
